articles.title: How to live longer: The 15-minute activity that could extend your lifespan - Express
articles.description: HOW TO live longer: Time tumbles on, whether you want it to or not. If you'd like to extend your lifespan, one daily 15-minute activity could do just that.

articles.author: The New York Times
articles.title: Brazil Covid Map and Case Count - The New York Times
articles.description: A detailed map shows the extent of the coronavirus outbreak, with charts and tables of the number of cases and deaths.

articles.title: The Best Outdoor Gear and Equipment | Outside Online - Outside Magazine
articles.description: Outside Magazine's Outdoor Gear channel features reviews on adventure-travel equipment, including camping tents, sleeping bags, and mountain bikes.
